name: Meenu Kumari
about: An undergraduate student pursuing a dual degree in Industrial and Systems Engineering from IIT Kharagpur. An enthusiastic learner skilled in the field of data science, machine learning, deep learning profound in python covering Libraries like NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn etc. Currently working on a Hand Gesture Recognition project to solve real-life problems. I am skilled in C/C++, python inclined towards their real-life applications.
